title: Vinci Backs Guidance as 3Q Revenue Rose
text:
By Pietro Lombardi

Vinci SA (DG.FR) said Thursday that its third-quarter revenue rose 12% and it backed its guidance for the year.

Revenue rose to 13.13 billion euros ($14.60 billion) from EUR11.68 billion in the same period last year, the French construction and infrastructure company said.

The company confirmed its guidance for the year, expecting an increase in revenue and net income.

Write to Pietro Lombardi at pietro.lombardi@dowjones.com

(END) Dow Jones Newswires

October 24, 2019 12:07 ET (16:07 GMT)
